metadata.title: CVE-2020-8086 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The mod_auth_ldap and mod_auth_ldap2 Community Modules through 2020-01-27 for Prosody incompletely verify the XMPP address passed to the is_admin() function. This grants remote entities admin-only functionality if their username matches the username of a local admin.

criterions.comment: prosody-modules package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0~hg20200128.09e7e880e056+dfsg-1').
